description: Adds HTTP2 support for Amazon CloudFront distributions.
Adds retry logic to the EC2 Metadata Service, so that EC2MetadataCredentials will retry TimeoutError. This retry logic is also added to ECSCredentials. Resolves #692
CORS support added. Now a default service in the browser build of the JavaScript SDK.
Adds support for bundling the SDK with webpack. Also adds support for creating node.js bundles using webpack or browserify.
